description: 【English version】Update 2020.10.10, add the overall resource overview! Support Grafana6&7,Support Node Exporter v0.16 and above.Optimize the main metrics display. Includes: CPU, memory, disk IO, network, temperature and other monitoring metrics。https://github.com/starsliao/Prometheus

targets.expr: {container_name="coti-node"} |= "i.c.b.services.BaseNodeMonitorService " != "MonitorService is up" | pattern `<_> Sources = <Sources>, DSPHealthState = <DSPHealthState>, DSPOutsideNormalCounter = <DSPOutsideNormalCounter>, TCCHealthState = <TCCHealthState>, TCCWaitingConfirmation = <TCCWaitingConfirmation>, TCCOutsideNormalCounter = <TCCOutsideNormalCounter>, PostponedTransactions = <PostponedTransactions>, PropagationQueue = <PropagationQueue>, WebSocketMessagesQueueLength = <WebSocketMessagesQueueLength>, waitingDspConsensus = <waitingDspConsensus>, confirmationQueueSize = <confirmationQueueSize>, percentageUsedHeapMemory = <percentageUsedHeapMemory>%, percentageUsedMemory = <percentageUsedMemory>%,`

panels.description:
Read/write completions per second

Writes completed: 每个磁盘分区每秒写完成次数

IO now 每个磁盘分区每秒正在处理的输入/输出请求数
panels.title: Disk IOps Completed（IOPS）

panels.description: The time spent on I/O in the natural time of each second.（wall-clock time）
panels.title: Time Spent Doing I/Os

panels.description: Time spent on each read/write operation
panels.title: Disk R/W Time(Reference: less than 100ms)(beta)

panels.description:
Sockets_used - Sockets currently in use

CurrEstab - TCP connections for which the current state is either ESTABLISHED or CLOSE- WAIT

TCP_alloc - Allocated sockets

TCP_tw - Sockets wating close

UDP_inuse - Udp sockets currently in use

RetransSegs - TCP retransmission packets

OutSegs - Number of packets sent by TCP

InSegs - Number of packets received by TCP
panels.title: Network Sockstat

targets.legendFormat: 使用的文件描述符占比_{{instance}}

title: Coti Private Dashboard
